description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A classic board game, Mancala is an easy game to learn but challenging to master. Challenge a friend locally or online or play against the AI opponent. Configurable with up to 8 seeds in each pit and 10 AI levels of difficulty. Uses the ELO rating system and shares high scores online.
